channel.title: 317 {Clean Delta} Altar's
channel.description: Ok, so I added the 2 altars but when I click on them nothing happens I want Ancient Magicks and Lunar Magics. Can someone help me?

item.title: 317 {Clean Delta} Altar's
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

if (objectID == ID) 
{
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient
sendMessage("You switch to #### spellbook!");
} else if (objectID == ID) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern
sendMessage("You switch to #### spellbook!");
}
}

Or I believe, if you want to use one object for them all.

If (objectID == ID) {
if (playerMagicBook > 0) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); 
} else if (playerMagicBook < 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855);
}
}

Might be an error there, I have to run. I’ll help you later if there is.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

i carnt code… but heres some how what you have to do

you put in the objects now you have to go into client.java nd put inn a commnd
like

if(playerMagicBook == 0) { setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //modern } else if(playerMagicBook == 1){ setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); // ancient } else { setSidebarInterface(6, 16640); }

i cannot guarrenty if i gave you the right code but might aswell try it m8
